news.title: Lala Poutine at Electric Picnic: Hand-cut chips in rich gravy, topped off with delicious cheese curds
news.summary: Electric Picnic is blessed with great food – here's one of our favourites...

news.title: Trailer released for Hamnet starring Jessie Buckley and Paul Mescal
news.summary: The film will also star Emma Waston and Joe Alwyn

news.title: Sting sued for millions by former Police bandmates over lost royalties
news.summary: Guitarist Andy Summers and drummer Stewart Copeland are reportedly suing for “substantial” damages.
